name: Espace de Clyde
description:
Is there someone in the closet? Am I dreaming? Where is my hallway? Where am I ?!

Espace de Clyde is a short non-euclidean game made in a week with Cherry Crisis (a housemade game engine made specially for non-euclidean). Wander a world of insane dreamlike geometries.

Credits:
  • Benjamin MARIN
  • Lancelot MARECHAL
  • Rayane TADJER
  • Rémi GINER
